text: Dahewan is a village in the Borsad taluka of Anand district in Gujarat state of India. Dahewan is a Gram Panchayat. == Religious Places == === Hindu === * Shiva Mandir, Kathana Station * Somnath Mahadev Mandir, Kathana Station * Harsidhdhi Temple, Chandanpura * Valiyadeva Temple, Chandanpura === Muslim === * Noorani Masji, Kalamsar * Nagina Masjid (Sunni), Khanpur * Masjid, Ranoli Category:Gujarat
title: Dahewan
